alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 25 at 7:25PM EDT until June 25 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following counties, Estill and Powell. * WHEN...Until 930 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 721 PM EDT, weather radar indicated heavy rain occurring due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. As of 7:15 PM, weather radar indicated some locations had already received 2 to 3 inches of rain during the afternoon and early evening. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Fitchburg, Cobhill, Furnace, Patsey, Knowlton, Pitts, Rogers Chapel, Pilot, See, Cottage Furnace and Willow Tree. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
